data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Jihočeský.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jihočeský, Czechia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jihočeský, Czechia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Jihočeský to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 4,612 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Czech-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Czech-speaking people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jihočeský, Czechia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Jihočeský, Czechia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Jihočeský, Czechia has a population of 625,700.

We estimate Jihočeský has 4,612 people who might know Jesus, 163,298 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 457,789 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 135 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Jihočeský, Czechia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
